ygData.subject: RE: Short Sword of Ykesha spoiler request
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Last night I did bugs/bats in SolB with no healer whatsoever. Best experience I ve gotten in a long time.  2 noxs, 1 death beetle, and no show on guano or
ygData.messageBody:
> they are insanely good in lower guk. i would have to say, without at least
> 1 cleric (2 is preferable: 1 for healing, 1 for stunning) do not even think

Last night I did bugs/bats in SolB with no healer whatsoever.
Best experience I've gotten in a long time. 2 noxs, 1 death
beetle, and no show on guano or stone. At one point we had
3 bats and 2 ldcs. A group with a healer would have fled,
but this group finished all the battles at full hp. How?

2 paladins, 1 enchanter, 1 bard, 1 monk, 1 wizard.

Enchanter does her thing, per usual. AE mez, AE stun.
Paladins are key to this. They can heal in a pinch if
needed. But they are the stunner elite. They are non-
stop stunning the mob during the fight. So much so, that
not one ldc hit us between the paladins and the enchanter
stunning. In fact, I have never killed ldcs and bats as
fast as I did in this group ever.. in my whole experience.
SLTW + sash + song = melee blender. At one point, one of
the paladins never stopped swinging. I never saw his sword
pause, it was always going. This same group could have
easily broken the lord room full lord/bok spawn, sans healer.

Harmonic.
